education.institution: University of North Carolina at Charlotte
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering

experience.title: Systems Operations Engineer
bullets: Ensured the maintenance of Service Level Objectives (SLOs) for front-end and back-end production applications.
Developed monitoring and alerting systems for credit card applications to minimize downtime.
Created executive and operational dashboards in Grafana for performance tracking.
Led Major Incident Management (MIM) calls, ensuring communication and resolution.

experience.title: Intern
bullets: Automated certificate renewal using Ansible, reducing manual effort.
Worked in an Agile environment using Jira for documentation and task tracking.

projects.title: Established Synthetic Monitoring
bullets: Developed synthetic monitoring in ThousandEyes to simulate traffic flows.
Set up automated alerts for failures, ensuring quick response.

projects.title: Dashboard Standardization
bullets: Designed Grafana dashboards to standardize team monitoring practices.
Created templates to enhance onboarding and business metrics reporting.

projects.title: Sunrising Applications
bullets: Onboarded over six applications to production from on-prem to cloud.
Established SLOs and documentation for operational readiness.

projects.title: Onboarded Applications to Elastic
bullets: Led application onboarding to Elastic APM for distributed tracing.
Improved system observability and performance analysis.

projects.title: Virtual Reality Training Simulation
bullets: Led a team of four to create a VR training simulation for tire manufacturing.
Collaborated with an industry partner to define project requirements.
Delivered a proof of concept integrating diverse technical expertise.
